org.nodes.util

Class LogNum

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • org.nodes.util.LogNum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LogNum>

    public class LogNum
extends java.lang.Number
implements java.lang.Comparable<LogNum>
    A number stored as the logarithm of its magnitude and its sign.
    Author:
    Peter
    See Also:
